text: State Route 739 (SR 739) was a short state highway in Clark County, Nevada that provided access to the town of Sloan south of the Las Vegas Valley. The route is no longer a state highway. ==Route description== The route followed a portion of Sloan Road that ran from the western Interstate 15 right-of-way east to Las Vegas Boulevard. ==History== SR 739 was deleted from the state highway system on June 7, 2010. However, the route is still maintained by the Nevada Department of Transportation as a frontage road. ==See also== * * ==References== 739
title: Nevada State Route 739
